qa.name: Maya
qa.essence: Curious archaeologist with a thirst for knowledge
qa.appearance: Athletic build, with tousled hair and glasses
qa.clothing: Khaki shorts, white shirt, and hiking boots

json_to_edit.voice_over: As I held the mask, I felt its ancient power coursing through me.
json_to_edit.description: Maya discovers an ancient mask in a hidden temple chamber.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant jungle sounds, wind whistling through stone corridors
json_to_edit.name: The Mask's Revelation
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Maya uncovers an ancient mask that begins to change her identity.

qa.action: Maya enters the vast, dimly lit chamber filled with ancient artifacts.

hf.action: Maya carefully brushes dust off a stone pedestal, revealing an intricately carved mask.

tr.action: The mask's empty eye sockets seem to stare back at Maya, pulsing with an otherworldly energy.

xc.action: Maya hesitates, then slowly lifts the mask from its resting place.

ka.action: Maya's eyes widen as she brings the mask closer to her face.

fn.action: The chamber seems to come alive as Maya places the mask on her face.

af.action: The mask melds with Maya's skin, her eyes glowing with ancient knowledge.

edit_command: Add a new shot after each existing shot, showing the gradual transformation of Maya's appearance. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: As I held the mask, I felt its ancient power coursing through me.
updated_json.description: Maya discovers an ancient mask in a hidden temple chamber.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Distant jungle sounds, wind whistling through stone corridors
updated_json.name: The Mask's Revelation
updated_json.scene_summary: Maya uncovers an ancient mask that begins to change her identity.

qa.action: Maya enters the vast, dimly lit chamber filled with ancient artifacts.

zx.action: A faint glow emanates from Maya's eyes as she surveys the chamber, her curiosity piqued.

hf.action: Maya carefully brushes dust off a stone pedestal, revealing an intricately carved mask.

wy.action: Maya's fingertips begin to shimmer with a subtle, iridescent light as they near the mask.

tr.action: The mask's empty eye sockets seem to stare back at Maya, pulsing with an otherworldly energy.

uv.action: Maya's hair begins to float slightly, defying gravity, as if charged with static electricity.

xc.action: Maya hesitates, then slowly lifts the mask from its resting place.

op.action: The skin on Maya's arms begins to shimmer, taking on a faint, scale-like pattern.

ka.action: Maya's eyes widen as she brings the mask closer to her face.

lm.action: Maya's irises begin to change color, swirling with hues of gold and emerald.

fn.action: The chamber seems to come alive as Maya places the mask on her face.

ij.action: Maya's clothing begins to shift and change, taking on patterns and colors reminiscent of ancient Mayan textiles.

af.action: The mask melds with Maya's skin, her eyes glowing with ancient knowledge.

qr.action: Maya's entire body radiates with ancient power, her appearance now a perfect blend of modern archaeologist and timeless Mayan deity.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot after each existing shot to show the gradual transformation of maya's appearance. this will effectively double the number of shots in the scene, alternating between the original shots and new shots that focus on maya's transformation. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly and add new shots to the "shots" dictionary, updating the "list_display_order" to reflect the new order. the new shots will be creative and descriptive, showing subtle changes in maya's appearance as she interacts with the mask.
